website_summaries.verdict: Although it lacks the exciting components of others we considered, it's affordable and a good choice for small kids and small yards.
pros: Doesn't take up much space and is fairly easy to assemble
Swings can hold up to 100 pounds each
Swing chains have plastic coatings that protect small hands
Cost falls on the lower end of the price spectrum
cons: Very basic, as it only includes two swings
Not durable enough for older kids or those who prefer active play

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. Great size for small yard.
customer_reviews.text: The swing set was very easy to assemble. Be sure you retughten all bolts once you set it upright. We put it together in less then an hour. I might get a toddler swing to replace one of the standard swings for a while, as our son is only two. I would buy this again. Our yard is pretty small but it fits nicely at one end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for out 7-y-o and 4-y-o for their "big" Christmas present. They love it! The seats are rigid, so if you're an average-sized adult or bigger, you rear will not fit. It goes together easily enough with a few tools. The covers for the chains have already torn at the top, but some zip ties can fix that. It is sturdy enough, but I do wish it had less side-to-side wobble in it.
customer_reviews.author: The Bryces

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed As this swingset is not very sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed As this swingset is not very sturdy at all. I worry about the safety of the kids on this. I have 2 -3 year olds in it and looks like it may collapse at any time. I kind of feel as if I wasted my money on this swing set. You get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Just right !!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 14 month old grandson who loves to swing. Small enough that we set it on the back patio so that we don't have to mow around it. We added a Little Tykes swing until he gets bigger. Very sturdy and easy enough to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Nannix

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level swing set
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive, fun, little swingset that is perfect for small backyards. It was easy to assemble; I did that part by myself. It is super important to anchor the swingset right away and not move it after it has been anchored. It is also important to make sure the frame is at the correct angles when anchoring it because the middle bar from where the swings hang, is two pieces. If the frame sides are too wide apart, the top, middle bar can buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great set for smaller kids
customer_reviews.text: So far this is working out for my grand babies but had to purchase age appropriate seats. The seats it came with don’t hang long enough for the little guys. Was so easy to put together. It came with anchors but my grand kids are still so little I haven’t had to use the anchors but will probably need them when my older grandkids come to visit. It’s a perfect size for a small yard and feels very durable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that the swing chains is covered in ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that the swing chains is covered in some plastic sheet, makes it less hot to hold on to on a hot summer day.
customer_reviews.author: Olumide A.

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Great for my girls ages 5 and 7 and I think depending how fast they grow good until at least 10. But a week after buying it one of the swing chains just broke all on its down. It’s a bummer for sure. Just be prepared for that to happen to you
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This frame is flimsy and moves off the ground, even with anchors in. It didn't come with correct bolts to even put entire thing together. After multiple trips to lowes for bolts, covering for bolts for safety (ones included didn't fit of course) replacement anchors that work, it finally is acceptable for my kids. But no, I don't recommend this frame.
customer_reviews.author: Gemini

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: The top bar needs two bolts instead of one. The bars don’t fit tight together which results in flex/movement of the entire frame. I’ll have modify it. The safety anchors are not good. I’ll have to buy some play set safety anchors from my local big hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Kona

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Inexpensive Swing Set
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this swing set it is really good. My two small children love it. It is not the sturdiest swing set, which is my only complaint. It will move and sway when you are swinging on it. You definitely want to anchor it. Overall, this is a good swing set for the price and my children have been having lots of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: liz Zrd

customer_reviews.title: Survived my two daughters
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing for the price. While probably not as study as the more expensive options, it's perfect for two kids and limited space. You'll need to anchor it in with more than the supplied anchors (I used 4 dog leash anchors, but cement would be better).
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Very simple and very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice swing. Easy to put together. Will need a couple extra tools to get the bolts and screws tight enough. Must bury in the ground but my kids have a blast on this swing.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Gilley

customer_reviews.title: Not worth anything, kinda dangerous actually.
customer_reviews.text: Not very stable, wouldn’t recommend having two kids on it at once, bends in the middle when the kids are swinging, will likely have to discard and find something else.
customer_reviews.author: PalatineJoe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made and will last for many years
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a backyard swing set. Love the seats they are nice and wide, don't fold and squeeze when the children sit on them. Much nicer than the ones at the park. Very sturdy, and the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: N. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Social distance and swinging
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap and simple. It gets the job done. Definitely for smaller children, but I'm fat and I've swung on them and didn't die... Yet. Lol we plan to cement it down
customer_reviews.author: Kimi & Shane

customer_reviews.title: Good for little kids.
customer_reviews.text: Works good with 2 baby swings on it. Would not use with very big kids.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to check the height of the swing set as it may be shorter than you imagine.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty small swing set with very fragile saddles: one of the swing seats broke within first day of usage, so we just threw it away, because a nut for a chain got trapped inside of the plastic seat. There is just one swing left on the frame and my 3 year old is still using it for the last couple moths. It feels too expensive for what it is, I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia Zinkova

customer_reviews.title: Best Choice set is made with kids in mind.  Sturdy, long, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is the anchors. They are not the best quality for screwing in the ground and keep the swings sturdy. I still gave this product a 5 because it is a great addition to my existing swing.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: FAST delivery, manufacturer's defect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4 year old nephew. My father put it together and he said it was simple. However, one of the holes for the screws was on the wrong side of a pole. Definitely a manufacturer's defect; luckily he is very handy and was able to put a new hole in the correct spot so we did not have to send the whole thing back. It was delivered very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Unstable and unsafe
customer_reviews.text: This is a very shoddy swing set... could not hold a 70 lb child. This is very unstable and unsafe. Would not recommend for child above 3 yrs
customer_reviews.author: rick haas

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Product seems strong enough for my 5 year old. Going to have it tested with 2 kids both weighing around 40 lbs each. Should easily be strong enough since the specs are 100lbs per child per swing.
customer_reviews.author: Travis A.

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: Horrible swingset.. got this for our son, 37lbs, for Christmas and his 1st time on it the swing set started swaying side to side at the top causing him to swing at an angle injuring himself on the pole. This was of course after it being secured to the ground!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: our 3 and 1 year old daughters love it!
customer_reviews.text: our 3 and 1 year old daughters love it!!!! it was easy to set up and this is one of the best investments we have done for our kids haha! and for our opportunity to take a break!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hart

customer_reviews.title: Missing bolts
customer_reviews.text: We set out to assemble our swing set this weekend. No bolts. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: miguel montes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Great size for my small back yard. Big enough for two kids to have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Shai

customer_reviews.title: Other than seats, works well
customer_reviews.text: My biggest issue is with the seats attached. My 4 y/o was afraid of sitting on it. So, had to buy new seats for both my kids (2 and 4 year old). Otherwise, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Zoya Epshteyn

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and weather resistant
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his swing. We used a toddler swing with the Movement God frame. I have yet to test the swing with 2 children on it but it seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: LadyN

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fact they ship free to hawaii. This product totally met my expectations as a quality product, especially for the great price. My 3 year old girl and 2yr old boy just loves it. We used extra stakes to stabilize since we have sandy soil and it is extremely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Strozier

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Decent swing for small children. Tough to anchor into grass. Moves a lot
customer_reviews.author: Barman6573

customer_reviews.title: The set was very easy to put together and only took about 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use for my 7 month old and purchased a little looked swing to use in place of the ones it came with. The set was very easy to put together and only took about 30 minutes. My husband used a different tool than the one provided to tighten the bolts so that probably took off some time. For the price and what I'm using it for, this set is great and absolutely worth it! I'm confident it will last until my boy is older and needs a more grown up set.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The swing set was perfect for my two young kids, but there was an issue with one of the chains. Their customer service responded quickly and resolved the issue by sending another chain. I’ll have two happy kids now, not just one.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Eas to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The anchors that come with it don't really work well. The seats are molded hard plastic, not the soft pliable rubber. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a smaller back yard.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assemble, light weight to move around the yard and not super long.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Jones

customer_reviews.title: This is just what I wanted!! My granddaughter ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted!! My granddaughter Loves it! Now we have a hard time getting her OFF !
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Keeps kids outside in the yard
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect fit for a small yard. My 5 year old granddaughter and 2 year old grandson love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for his birthday and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good, low cost, swing set for small children. Went together easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little swig
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small yard. My 4 year old loves it. Will last her a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grandma's house
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my granddaughter and addition of baby bucket swing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Patin

customer_reviews.title: It was definately worth what we paid for it & has served it's it's purpose well.
customer_reviews.text: The frame is not as stable as it should be and we will have to replace chains for swings, really soon. Granddaughter loves it though and it gets played on, ALOT.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Frame is pretty unstable, even after securing to
customer_reviews.text: Swings are okay. Frame is pretty unstable, even after securing to ground
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Just right for my 2 yr old grandson
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Just right for my 2 yr old grandson. He loves it! It's small, but it's just right size. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to set up. I put a baby swing on it and my daughter LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item delivered damaged
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing to buy something new for it to be delivered damaged.
customer_reviews.author: rob kopasek

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a simple swing set
customer_reviews.text: I originally received a damaged swing set, but the company was eventually willing to fix the problem by sending a new set. It's a good, basic swing set and it's what I expected for the price. It's definitely better for small children. I should note that the chain covers are a different color than they appear in the photos here - they are a bright neon orange, which isn't my first preference.
customer_reviews.author: cjsmith

customer_reviews.title: Great swing for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is great for the price! There are some things to know though: the seats are designed for small children (probably under 10), it’s a little wobbly and lifts off the ground slightly with 2 children swinging together (even with the stakes in the ground), and the swings are pretty close together so it’s easy for kids to crash into each other if either begins to swing slightly crooked. That being said, it works great for what it is and our kids love having their very own swing set in the back yard!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, well made product - our granddaughter is going to love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Small lightweight swing for littles.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great little swing for a 1 & 4 1/2 yr old. I just can’t use the other chain due to the bolt not being threaded on the right end. See picture!
customer_reviews.author: B Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great swing set by a great company (updated review)
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: We changed our review from 3 stars to 5 stars. Customer service at Movement God contacted us quickly when they saw a bolt was missing in the original shipment. They sent a replacement bolt right away and have stayed in contact with us until we had the replacement in hand. Customer service is extremely important when doing business and we must say Movement God is outstanding. We would definitely buy from this company again. Thanks so much for standing behind your product. The swing went together easily and works great. It was missing one of the bolt and washer sets though. I'll have to go to Lowes to buy a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: My kids are disappointed and so am I
customer_reviews.text: I am FURIOUS! I ordered this as an Easter gift and not all of the parts were in the box. We are missing an entire piece. It was packaged as new. My kids are disappointed and so am I. Sending it back...
customer_reviews.author: Carol J. Fort

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is good but i don't know the size limit. Can the chains withstand any weight
customer_reviews.author: Sara Gan

product_meta.title: Movement God Metal A-Frame Two Seat Swing Set
product_meta.description:
This basic backyard swing set comes with 2 swing sets. It is constructed of powder-coated steel to resist rusting, and UV-protected polyethylene plastic to reduce heat retention, fading, and discoloration. Unlike a wooden swing set, with a metal construction there are no splinters, warping, or rough edges.

Features
- UV-Resistant, retains strength and maintains color
- Low Maintenance, no staining or painting required
- Free-Standing, no need for cement
- All-Weather Resistant, will not crack, warp, rot, or splinter
- Passes playground performance and safety standards

Specifics
- Recommended age: 3-8 years
- Maximum users: 2 children
- Maximum per user weight: 100 lbs
- Dimensions: 119“ x 74” x 73”

Hurry up, and get one of the swing set for your kids now.

NOTE:
If you are not 100% satisfied with it, please feel free to contact us.
Your Account > Your Orders > Purchased Items > Seller: Movement God > Ask a Question
feature_bullets: Safe and strong steel-pole construction, and hard edges are rounded or covered with plastic, passes playground performance and safety standards
Swing set comes with 2 swing seats to 2 children of age from 3 to 8 years old at once
Ideal for medium to large backyards; measures 119"(W) x 74"(D) x 73"(H); supports kids weighing up to 100 lbs. each, up to 400 lbs. Total
Perfect for kids playing at the same time. Kids benefit from frequent physical activities. You benefit from knowing the kids' safety in your own backyard
Meets and/or exceeds ASTM safety standards. Backed by our Friendly Customer Service

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars99 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
